    • Method Detail

      • reinforcementPhase

        void reinforcementPhase(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Territory> territoryList,
                        Territory territory,
                        Player currentPlayer,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Territory> terrArList,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Territory> adjTerrArList)
        This method is responsible for reinforcement phase.
        Parameters:
        territoryList - Territory list
        territory - Selected territory.
        currentPlayer - Current player.
        terrArList - List of territories available to player.
        adjTerrArList - List of adjacent territories.

      • attackPhase

        void attackPhase(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Territory> terrList,
                 javafx.scene.control.ListView<Territory> adjTerrList,
                 PlayerModel playerModel,
                 java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Territory> terrArList,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Territory> adjTerrArList)
          throws InvalidGameActionException
        This method implements the attack phase of the strategy.
        Parameters:
        terrList - listview of territory which belong to a player
        adjTerrList - adjacent territory listview for a particular territory
        playerModel - object of PlayerModel
        playerList - list of players
        terrArList - List of territories available to player.
        adjTerrArList - List of adjacent territories.
        Throws:
        InvalidGameActionException - throws InvalidGameActionException if move is not valid

      • fortificationPhase

        boolean fortificationPhase(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Territory> selectedTerritory,
                           javafx.scene.control.ListView<Territory> adjTerritory,
                           Player currentPlayer,
                           Map map,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Territory> terrArList,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Territory> adjTerrArList)
        This method implements the fortification phase of the strategy.
        Parameters:
        selectedTerritory - List of selected territories for fortification.
        adjTerritory - List of adjacent territories for fortification.
        currentPlayer - The current player object.
        map - The current map loaded.
        terrArList - List of territories.
        adjTerrArList - List of adjacent territories.
        Returns:
        Returns a true value if fortification is possible.

      • hasAValidAttackMove

        default boolean hasAValidAttackMove(java.util.ArrayList<Territory> territories)
        Check if the player has a valid attack move
        Parameters:
        territories - List of territories with the player.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the player has a valid move available.

        Returns:
        List of defending territories.
